full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Commonwealth of Canada 

**Procurement ID**: cb-7042-9445667
**Solicitation ID**: W8486-228625/A
**Posting Date**: July 11, 2023
**Closing Date**: August 21, 2023, at 14:00 (local time)

## Purpose:
The Department of National Defence, Ministère de la Défense Nationale, invites bidders to submit a Standing Offer for the Overhead Protection Support Kit.

## Product Description:
The successful bidder will supply the items listed below, in accordance with the technical specifications.

* Item 1 & 2: SUPPORT KIT, OVERHEAD PROTECTION (NSN: 4240-21-860-2852) with the following quantities:
  * 25 CFSD Montreal: 1 EA (as and when requested)
  * 7 CFSD Edmonton: 1 EA (as and when requested)

## Key Requirements:
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name, model and/or part number, and NCAGE.
* Deliveries are expected to be made to Department of National Defence facilities in Montreal and Edmonton, as specified above.

## Tender Type:
* Competitive Procurement with a selection process based on the Lowest Price criterion.

## Trade Agreements:
This tender is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and other applicable trade agreements.

## Eligibility:
Suppliers must meet all eligibility requirements as outlined in the solicitation document.

## Documentation:
Tender documents, including an RFQ document, amendments, and other relevant information, are available on [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7042/).

## Contact Information:
For any queries or clarification, please contact:
* Ednar Domingues de Araujo
* Ednar.Dominguesdearaujo@FORCES.GC.CA (contact email)
* (343) 572-8680 (contact telephone)
* [See attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7042/) for full contact information 


Note: I removed some redundant information and kept only essential data from the original text to save space while rewriting the text. I also applied stricter grammar and punctuation throughout. The level of formality used is strict and neutral throughout. Let me know if there are further requirements to fulfill.
